thread.title: Wahaca’s Day Of The Dead dates revealed
thread.title_full: Wahaca’s Day Of The Dead dates revealed

author: Sarah Bargiela
title: Wahaca’s Day Of The Dead dates revealed
text:
Sarah Bargiela Festivals , Music News copyright Wahaca's 
This coming November Wahaca will be hosting the Mexican fiesta, Day of The Dead (Dia de los Muertos) on 7th November at London’s Tobacco Dock. The event will be a 12 hour party bonanza packed with exciting music acts, Mexican street food, debates, art, an immersive theatre, Mexican drinks, dancing, Mexican wrestling and more. 
This year’s music line-up includes The Horrors, Crystal Fighters, Zoe, Mexican Morrissey tribute band Mexrrissey just to name a few. DJ’s playing on the night include Toy Selectah, Erick Rincon and Psychemagick. 
The Horrors said aobu“The Mexican tradition of celebrating the dead on Dia De Los Muertos is something we’ve been interested in for a while – a brilliantly macabre yet uplifting party … It’s great the celebrations are heading to the UK – we’re really looking forward to playing Wahaca’s Day Of The Dead Festival.” 
Dia de los muertos or Day Of The Dead is celebrated across Latin America and is a celebration of the lives of loved ones who’ve passed away.
